patthana14.28:1.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.28:1.1_1: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana14.28:2.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.
